entry.lex: Alessio Romagnoli who played for the Italy national under-16 football team, is a member of AC Milan who are in the Serie A league and managed by Sinisa Mihajlovic.
Former Italian national under-16 football player, Alessio Romagnoli, plays for the club A.C. Milan, which is managed by Siniša Mihajlović and is in Serie A league.
